text:
Hi everyone, my name is Justine Tan 
and I'm with the IBM Cloud team.
Let’s talk about IBM Cloud Pak for Integration.
More than ever, organizations are looking to digitally transform,

providing their employees 
with secure and timely access to relevant data

and empowering them to make 
better business decisions.

But before they can innovate, they need to 
connect all of their data and applications,

while at the same time minimizing their 
exposure to business and security risks.

Unfortunately, traditional approaches 
to integration are slow to implement,

hard to scale, and requires 
skill-intensive, complex technologies.

Organizations need to accelerate integration 
with a new agile and AI-powered approach, one

that offers specialized integration capabilities 
and enables extended teams to create integrations,

leverages a complete set of integration styles 
and capabilities, and embeds AI and automation.

Enter IBM Cloud Pak for Integration, a 
comprehensive, hybrid integration platform

that leverages AI-powered automation across the 
integration lifecycle to improve use cases like

natural language-powered integration 
flows, AI-assisted mapping,

API test creation, anomaly detection, 
as well as workload balancing.

In addition, you can accelerate development 
of integrations by re-using assets that are

published to the asset repository and by 
leveraging built-in smart connectors.

Achieve the optimal mix of legacy and new system 
development, modernizing core applications to be

cloud-native and unlocking the value of your data 
and services while sun-setting other systems.

Bringing together the industry’s most 
complete set of tools and capabilities

and enhancing them through automated deployment 
eliminates the expensive maintenance downtime

and multiple licensing fees that accompany other 
vendor offerings or “roll your own” approaches.

With IBM Cloud Pak for Integration, we’ve seen 
companies speed their integration development by

300%, reduce their integration costs by over 33%, 
and increase their overall operational efficiency.

All while maintaining enhanced 
security, governance, and availability.
Contact us to learn more about how we can help you build IBM Cloud Pak for Integration
into your business strategy.
As always, be sure to subscribe and stay tuned for more videos like this in the future.
